alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Dawson; Gaines; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 9:13PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Andrews, southeastern Gaines, western Borden, Martin and Dawson Counties through 1000 PM CST... At 913 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Lenorah, or 19 miles south of Lamesa, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lamesa, Ackerly, Lenorah, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Welch, Los Ybanez, Tarzan, Sparenberg, Punkin Center, Patricia, Arvana, Hancock, Tenmile, Key and Klondike. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
